ageVerification.title: Age Verification
ageVerification.message: You must be 18 years or older to enter this site.

header.description: Experience the finest selection of cigars with our comprehensive companion app. Track, rate, and discover your perfect smoke.

features.title: Features
features.subtitle: Everything you need to enhance your cigar experience in one elegant app

items.title: Comprehensive Database
items.description: Browse through thousands of cigars with detailed information about origin, blend, and characteristics.

items.title: Personal Collections
items.description: Organize and track your cigar collection with ease. Keep inventory and manage your humidor digitally.

items.title: Tasting Notes
items.description: Record detailed tasting experiences, rate your cigars, and build your personal flavor profile.

items.title: Offline Access
items.description: Access your entire collection and notes anytime, anywhere - no internet connection required.

items.title: Real-time Updates
items.description: Stay current with the latest additions to our database and community reviews.

discover.title: Discover the App
discover.subtitle: Take a visual tour of Cigarrynos' elegant interface

download.title: Get Started Today
download.subtitle: Available on iOS and Android platforms
